scripts.prestart: node check-env.js DB_HOST DB_USER DB_PASSWORD DB_NAME DB_PORT JWT_SECRET NODE_ENV LOG_LEVEL PORT
scripts.migrate: npm run prestart && knex migrate:latest --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate-js: npm run prestart && knex migrate:latest --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.migrate-test-js: npm run prestart && knex migrate:latest --env test --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.rollback: npm run prestart && knex migrate:rollback --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.ts
scripts.rollback-js: npm run prestart && knex migrate:rollback --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:run: npm run prestart && knex seed:run --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.ts
scripts.seed:run-js: npm run prestart && knex seed:run --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:run-test-js: npm run prestart && knex seed:run --env test --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.seed:make-js: npm run prestart && knex seed:make --env development --knexfile ./db/knexfile.js
scripts.waste: node -e "require('fs').rename('db/knexfile.js', 'db/knexfile.jsgone', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.revamp: node -e "require('fs').rename('db/knexfile.jsgone', 'db/knexfile.js', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.dev: set DEBUG=contact* & npm run prestart && ts-node-dev --respawn --transpileOnly ./app/app.ts
